content: How can I troubleshoot why my docker zulip isnt renewing the lets encrypt cert? I am using 6.1 (just upgraded to 6.2) I have SSL_CERTIFICATE_GENERATION: "certbot" in my docker-compose.yml and it was working until it expired
This topic was moved here from #issues > Zulip docker not renewing cert by Lauryn Menard.
@Nathan A - Just a heads up that I moved your message to the #production help stream so that folks who will be able to answer your question will see it sooner.
@Nathan A This is unfortunately a known issue #DZ381.
